plantManager.heroTitle: The platform built for Plant Managers
plantManager.heroSubtitle: Full visibility of your operations in real time.
plantManager.whyChooseTitle: Run a tighter ship without extra burden
plantManager.whyChooseProveRoi: Prove the ROI, not just the effort
plantManager.whyChooseProveRoiDesc: Stop debating maintenance investments. Tractian gives you real numbers tied to real results - failures prevented, hours saved, resources optimized. It's the kind of data that makes budget conversations easier.
plantManager.whyChooseDowntime: Get ahead of downtime before it escalates
plantManager.whyChooseDowntimeDesc: See the earliest signs of failure and take action before it snowballs into a crisis. Tractian helps your team to go from reactive firefighting to proactive planning - with fewer surprises and fewer urgent calls.
plantManager.whyChooseLeaner: Run a leaner, more effective team
plantManager.whyChooseLeanerDesc: Labor is tight, training takes time, and turnover hurts. Tractian gives your existing team tools that are intuitive and powerful - helping them improve their skills, solve problems faster, follow plans clearly, and deliver more every shift.
plantManager.whyChooseAuditsDesc: Tractian helps standardize your processes, organize maintenance records, and generate reliable reports - so audits are easier, risks are reduced, and compliance becomes part of the daily routine.
plantManager.reportsTitle: Built for smarter oversight and real results
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityTitle: Show what's working with reports built for leadership visibility.
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityDesc: Tractian tracks the metrics that matter - from downtime trends to execution rates - so you can prove value at every review.
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityBullet1: Monitor backlog, downtime, maintenance costs, financial planning
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityBullet2: Export data for audits, reports, and budget justification
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityBullet3: Use filters by area, asset, failure type, or timeframe
plantManager.reportsForScalabilityBullet4: Make better decisions based on real performance trends
plantManager.operationalOversightTitle: Get a single pane of glass for maintenance and production.
plantManager.operationalOversightDesc: See asset performance, team productivity, and critical metrics in one place.
plantManager.operationalOversightBullet1: Unified view of maintenance and reliability data
plantManager.operationalOversightBullet3: Track equipment health and team allocation
plantManager.operationalOversightBullet4: Eliminate blind spots that lead to disruptions
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityTitle: Standardize maintenance and reliability efforts across multiple facilities without increasing complexity.
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityDesc: Manage and compare assets and teams performance in one place.
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityBullet1: Track KPIs across plants or business units
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityBullet2: Unify processes, alerts, and planning under a single platform
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityBullet3: Benchmark efficiency and uptime between sites
plantManager.multisiteVisibilityBullet4: Apply learnings from one facility to others quickly
plantManager.noLaborGapsTitle: Address labor shortages without adding headcount.
plantManager.noLaborGapsDesc: Automate routine work and keep your team coordinated so nothing falls through the cracks.
plantManager.noLaborGapsBullet1: Reduce administrative burden with smart automation
plantManager.noLaborGapsBullet2: Centralized task assignment and real-time updates
plantManager.noLaborGapsBullet3: Less reliance on whiteboards, spreadsheets, and emails
plantManager.noLaborGapsBullet4: One platform for the whole team to stay in sync
plantManager.threePillarsTitle: You run the plant. We’ve got your back.
plantManager.pillar1Desc: Get everyone on the same page - no more silos or scattered systems. Our solutions help you track maintenance, reliability, and execution in one place so your team moves faster.
plantManager.pillar2Desc: Skip the lengthy training and slow ramp-up. With tools your team actually uses, you’ll see impact quickly - without needing extra headcount, expensive consultants, or complex rollouts.
plantManager.pillar3Desc: Our expert team works shoulder-to-shoulder with you, from install to scale-up. With hands-on support, we’re on site when it matters - helping you train teams, fine-tune setups, and hit your goals faster.
plantManager.testimonialsTitle: Hear it from the people who use it every day
plantManager.testimonial1Quote: With everything centralized within Tractian platform, we finally have the visibility to act fast, plan smarter, and show real results.
plantManager.testimonial2Quote: I like that I can track all of our assets from one location. If a motor is having issues in one part of the plant, and another on the other side of the plant, I am able to basically troubleshoot both motors from the same place.
plantManager.testimonial3Quote: Now when I get to the plant, I just log in and everything I need is right there - step-by-step instructions, what I need to do. It's a lot easier, way faster, and less of a hassle.
plantManager.testimonial4Quote: Nothing was too much trouble for them, and they went to the 'nth' degree to understand Lyka's business and asset care short & long-term strategic plan. This level of seeking to understand made the implementation particularly user friendly.
plantManager.testimonial4Role: Head of Manufacturing and Supply Chain
plantManager.logosSubtitle: Trusted by hundreds of leaders from U.S. and global manufacturers
